summary: Skyrim Lighting Enhancement by TheMetaMorphe using ENB by Boris Vorontsov.
descriptionHtml:
TMM-ENB Skyrim Lighting Enhancement by TheMetaMorphe.

Thanks to Boris Vorontsov for making ENB : http://enbdev.com

//INSTALL INFO

EnbMod : extract the content of the folder into your skyrim folder ( where the .exe is ).

Then between these folders take the enbseries.ini and put it into your skyrim folder.

EnbMod_NoSSAO : No ambient occlusion for low range pc

EnbMod_SSAO : Ambient Occlusion for middle range pc

EnbMod_SSIL : AMbient occlusion with indirect lighting for high range pc ( Very high performance cost )

//RECCOMENDED MODS

- Vurt\'s Flora Overhaul : http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=141
- Serious HD Retexture Landscape Skyrim : http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2146
- Any FXAA injector that use Sharpen Effect.

//IMPORTANT

In order to make the mod working correclty you need to set bFloatPointRenderTarget to 1 in your skyrimprefs.ini.
Also disable MSAA and Antialiasing.

Enjoy !
author: TheMetaMorphe
